alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 12:31PM CDT until October 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALWORTH...RACINE AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 1231 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Raymond to near Browns Lake to near Richmond, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Twin Lakes, Raymond, Wheatland, Yorkville, Genoa City, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Powers Lake, Browns Lake, Pell Lake, Eagle Lake and Bohners Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
